METROTECH SOLUTIONS INC.
PERFORMANCE REVIEW DOCUMENTATION

===================================================================
ANNUAL PERFORMANCE REVIEW - 2019
Employee: Patricia Wong
Position: Director of Client Services
Review Period: May 1, 2018 - April 30, 2019
Reviewer: Linda Chen, VP Operations

OVERALL RATING: MEETS EXPECTATIONS

Key Strengths:
- Successfully onboarded and integrated into the team
- Built strong relationships with key clients
- Implemented new client tracking system
- Excellent communication skills

Areas for Development:
- Continue to develop strategic planning skills
- Increase delegation to team members

Salary Increase: 3.5% ($98,325 annually)
Annual Bonus: $9,000 (Achieved 90% of target)

Comments: Patricia has made a strong start in her first year. Looking forward to continued growth in the role.

_________________________________
Linda Chen, VP Operations
Date: May 15, 2019

===================================================================
ANNUAL PERFORMANCE REVIEW - 2020
Employee: Patricia Wong
Position: Director of Client Services
Review Period: May 1, 2019 - April 30, 2020
Reviewer: Linda Chen, VP Operations

OVERALL RATING: EXCEEDS EXPECTATIONS

Key Strengths:
- Client retention rate increased from 87% to 94%
- Successfully managed team through COVID-19 transition
- Implemented remote client service protocols
- Led cross-functional project that increased client satisfaction scores by 15%

Areas for Development:
- Expand network in the industry
- Consider pursuing professional development in leadership

Salary Increase: 5% ($103,241 annually)
Annual Bonus: $12,000 (Achieved 120% of target)

Comments: Exceptional performance during a challenging year. Patricia demonstrated strong leadership during the pandemic transition.

_________________________________
Linda Chen, VP Operations
Date: May 10, 2020

===================================================================
ANNUAL PERFORMANCE REVIEW - 2021
Employee: Patricia Wong
Position: Director of Client Services
Review Period: May 1, 2020 - April 30, 2021
Reviewer: Linda Chen, VP Operations

OVERALL RATING: EXCEEDS EXPECTATIONS

Key Strengths:
- Secured three major new enterprise clients
- Team morale and productivity remained high
- Developed comprehensive client onboarding program
- Mentored junior staff members

Areas for Development:
- Continue to refine data analytics skills
- Lead more strategic initiatives

Salary Increase: 5% ($108,403 annually)
Annual Bonus: $13,000 (Achieved 130% of target)

Comments: Patricia continues to be a valuable member of our leadership team. Her client relationships are a key asset to the company.

_________________________________
Linda Chen, VP Operations
Date: May 12, 2021

===================================================================
ANNUAL PERFORMANCE REVIEW - 2022
Employee: Patricia Wong
Position: Director of Client Services
Review Period: May 1, 2021 - April 30, 2022
Reviewer: James Park, CEO (Linda Chen departed)

OVERALL RATING: MEETS EXPECTATIONS

Key Strengths:
- Maintained client relationships during leadership transition
- Successfully handled challenging client situations
- Team performance remained stable

Areas for Development:
- Adapt to new strategic direction
- Increase focus on revenue growth metrics

Salary Increase: 4% ($112,739 annually)
Annual Bonus: $10,000 (Achieved 100% of target)

Comments: Good performance during a year of organizational change. Looking forward to seeing more innovation in the coming year.

_________________________________
James Park, CEO
Date: May 20, 2022

===================================================================
ANNUAL PERFORMANCE REVIEW - 2023
Employee: Patricia Wong
Position: Director of Client Services
Review Period: May 1, 2022 - March 31, 2023
Reviewer: James Park, CEO

OVERALL RATING: EXCEEDS EXPECTATIONS

Key Strengths:
- Client retention rate at 96% (highest in company history)
- Successfully negotiated contract renewals worth $2.1M
- Team engagement scores improved by 20%
- Reduced client service response times by 35%

Areas for Development:
- Continue building skills in emerging technologies
- Mentor next generation of leaders

Salary Increase: 5% ($118,376 annually, effective May 1, 2023)
Mid-Year Salary Adjustment: Additional 5.5% ($125,000 annually, effective August 1, 2023)
Annual Bonus: $15,000 (Achieved 150% of target)

Comments: Outstanding performance. Patricia is a key member of our leadership team and critical to our client success.

_________________________________
James Park, CEO
Date: April 5, 2023

===================================================================
MID-YEAR CHECK-IN - AUGUST 2023
Employee: Patricia Wong
Position: Director of Client Services
Date: August 10, 2023
Reviewer: James Park, CEO

Performance Status: ON TRACK

Recent Achievements:
- Successfully launched new client portal
- Onboarded 2 new team members
- Q2 client satisfaction scores: 92%

No concerns or issues identified.

Next formal review: April 2024

_________________________________
James Park, CEO
